item.title: Ayija Municipality Ranks Fourth in Property Tax Collection in the State
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal : RI and RO, along with Bill Collectors and Ward Officers, Appreciated for Their Efforts.
Ayija Municipality in Jogulamba Gadwal district has secured the fourth position in the state in property tax collection for the financial year 2024-25, announced Municipal Commissioner Sri CH Saidulu.
Speaking on the occasion, the Commissioner stated that this year, the municipality achieved an unprecedented 95% property tax collection since its establishment.
Out of a total demand of Rs. 1.82 cro...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh

item.title: Congress Party Demands Restoration of Ancient Wells in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal : Jogulamba Gadwal district: Former Zilla Parishad Chairperson and Congress Party Gadwal Constituency In-Charge Sarithamma, along with former Municipal Chairman B.S. Keshav, met District Collector B.M. Santosh and submitted a petition regarding the protection and restoration of the historic wells in Gadwal. The meeting was held in light of the ongoing controversy surrounding the Kottabavi (New Well) in Gadwal.
Sarithamma reaffirmed that the Congress Party had previously safeguarded the L...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
